title: Why all melodies should be free for musicians to use | Damien Riehl
itunes:author: Damien Riehl
description: Evoke a familiar tune in a song and get slapped with a lawsuit ... it's a tale almost as old as copyright itself. Lawyer and technologist Damien Riehl digs into why "owning" a melody is a ludicrous legal assertion and composes a radical solution for the musical woes of songwriters everywhere.
itunes:subtitle: Why all melodies should be free for musicians to use | Damien Riehl
